data.title: Daniel Freeman – Blue Valley North Band
data.text:
BVN Band Update: Summer is Here!

Summer is Here! 2023-2025 was an AMAZING year in the Band! Room 237, Spain, and SO much wonderful music, all year!! We are so very proud of the student growth and performances. CLICK HERE for a PDF of the Concert on the Lawn Program, which is also a year-in-review for [...]

May 21st, 2024|Categories: Band Update Category|

Band Update: the 4th Quarter in the BVN Band!

Fourth Quarter in the Band is AMAZING! During these final weeks of the school year, we'll perform our most challenging (and rewarding) music of the year, celebrate this wonderful school year, start getting prepared for next year, and (most importantly) celebrate our incredible students and senior class. The fourth quarter is [...]

March 20th, 2024|Categories: Band Update Category|

Band Update: February through Spring Break in the Band!

The final week before Spring Break is a FUN one! The week of 3/4 is going to be awesome: Feeder Festival Concert Monday 3/4! CLICK HERE to go to the Band app where you can sign up for our volunteer needs: 5 PM Set -up help (lots of people!) 6 [...]

Band Update – January in the BVN Band!

(Week of 1-22 in the Band, Updated) January in the BVN Band & Welcome to the Second Semester!! First semester was WONDERFUL! Spain was... beyond my words to describe. WHAT AN EXPERIENCE!!! That parade was a performance and environment like no other... the world as it should be - happy, [...]

Band Update – Happy Holidays!

Happy Holidays to All! First semester was WONDERFUL! SO much great student growth, wonderful memories, and outstanding music/performances. I am VERY excited to head to Spain with many of you, and even more excited for our Spring Band Classes!! Over the holidays - everyone should definitely take a break! I [...]

December 23rd, 2023|Categories: Band Update Category|

Band Update – December in the BVN Band!

Overview - Week of 11/27 Band Quick Links: DECEMBER BAND CONCERT DETAILS: Concert is Wednesday 12/13 at 7 PM, in the BVN PAC, with a reception after the concert. CLICK HERE TO DONATE to our POST-CONCERT RECEPTION CONCERT BLACK ATTIRE Attire for students is concert black: head to toe black [...]

November 26th, 2023|Categories: Band Update Category|

Band Update – November in the BVN Band!

Overview - Week of 11/13 Band Quick Links: CLICK HERE to Volunteer for our HEN HOUSE GROCERY BAGGING FUNDRAISER!!! This is an amazing fundraiser as we are visible and supporting our local community/locally owned business AND we make good money! Several band students have been hired by Hen House after [...]
